articles.title: Can Coffee or Tea Help Prevent Dementia and Stroke?
articles.description: Researchers found a link between several caffeinated beverages a day and a reduced risk of both conditions.

articles.title: Do Probiotics Help Your Immune System?
articles.description: Probiotics are well-known for promoting digestive health, but there’s evidence they may support a healthy immune system too. Here is what to know about what probiotics are best and how to get more of them.

articles.title: 10 Sneaky Sodium Bombs
articles.description: Food that is high in salt can increase your blood pressure, even if you don’t have a problem yet. Learn about some high-sodium foods you might not suspect.

articles.title: The 10 Healthiest Ingredients in Indian Food
articles.description: Healthy Indian food uses plant-based ingredients, whole grains, and fermented foods. Here are some healthy ingredients to add to your home-cooked Indian recipes.

articles.title: 7 Foods That Fight Back: Immune System Boosters
articles.description: With colds and the flu and COVID-19, your immune system could use some help. Grab some of these foods as backup. They’re packed with nutrients scientifically proven to strengthen your immunity and fend off illness.

articles.title: 8 Healthy Dishes to Order at Indian Restaurants, According to an RD
articles.description: When you’re eating out at restaurants or ordering takeout, it’s not always easy to know what Indian food is healthy. A nutrition pro givers her picks for the healthiest options on the menu.

articles.title: 5 Rules for a Healthier Breakfast Sandwich
articles.description: Breakfast sandwiches are a popular grab-and-go a.m. option but not the most nutritious. These expert tips will help you order or create a healthier morning meal.

articles.title: 10 Easy Dessert Recipes (That Are Good for You, Too)
articles.description: These simple, good-for-you treats will seriously satisfy your sweet tooth when you’re in need of a quick and satisfying dessert. Bonus: They’re packed with nutrition!

articles.title: Intermittent Fasting May Be as Effective for Weight Loss as Cutting 500 Calories a Day, Research Suggests
articles.description: A new review of intermittent fasting plans including the 5:2 diet, alternate-day diet, and time-restricted eating suggests that they may be as effective for weight loss as cutting calories, and may improve metabolic health, too.
